alert.note: Alert for Coweta (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coweta County through 815 PM EDT... At 743 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Turin, or 8 miles southeast of Newnan, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Senoia, Sharpsburg and Turin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
